data.title: Essential Components
data.desc: Timing hardware includes transponders, safety lights and loops, seamlessly integrating with lap timing systems for precise individual and group performance evaluations.

data.title: User-Friendly
data.desc: Facilitates convenient printing of lap timing and scoring data, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in recording and analyzing race performance.

iedgeData.title: iWallet App
iedgeData.desc: Discover a new level of convenience with our iWallet App. Guests can effortlessly conduct transactions using Apple Pay and Google Pay, turning their smartphones into virtual wallets. Dive into the endless possibilities by downloading our iWallet Brochure.

iedgeData.title: iService App
iedgeData.desc: Simplify game management with our iService App, whether you operate one location or multiple. This app enables remote handling of maintenance tasks, from taking a game out of service to tracking repair information. All updates are automatically synchronized on the server and in the cloud, ensuring seamless operations.

iedgeData.title: Inventory App
iedgeData.desc: Seize control of your redemption inventory with our Inventory App. Compatible with Android and iOS devices, this app empowers your staff to effortlessly manage inventory. Streamline inventory management by scanning UPC codes on merchandise, reducing labor costs, and eliminating errors.

careeerYellowCardData.title: Innovative Environment
careeerYellowCardData.desc: CSML is a playground for creativity. We encourage out-of-the-box thinking and provide a platform for your ideas to come to life.

careeerYellowCardData.title: Impactful Work
careeerYellowCardData.desc: CSML is a playground for creativity. We encourage out-of-the-box thinking and provide a platform for your ideas to come to life.

careeerYellowCardData.title: Continuous Growth
careeerYellowCardData.desc: CSML is a playground for creativity. We encourage out-of-the-box thinking and provide a platform for your ideas to come to life.

icashierData.title: iCashier Station
icashierData.desc: Streamline operations effortlessly with our comprehensive system. From managing quick-service food to overseeing customer engagement, we register vital details like name, address, email, and birth date, accompanied by personalized customer photos. Our system efficiently handles game maintenance, producing out-of-service reports, consolidating redemption points, and implementing a preventative maintenance program with a service log. The added touch of customizable graphics ensures a unique and engaging experience tailored to your specific needs.

icashierData.title: iCashier Mobile
icashierData.desc: The service effortlessly extends its capabilities throughout the facility, allowing users to check balances, register customers, and execute redemption services. With features like selling and recharging cards, utilizing a credit card reader, bar code scanner, and webcam, it delivers a comprehensive solution for various transaction requirements.

icashierData.title: iRedemption
icashierData.desc: Experience the efficiency of real-time inventory management with our digital packing list, ensuring accuracy and instant updates. Simplify transactions, eliminate paper tickets, and streamline B-to-B replenishment. Receive timely notifications for merchandise reorders, and effortlessly match redemption transactions to sales in the same period. Track redemption history by location for comprehensive insights into your inventory dynamics.

icashierData.title: Online Waiver
icashierData.desc: Optimize your guest experience with our Online Waiver. Guests can conveniently sign releases from any device before arriving, reducing queues at your center. Stored securely in the cloud, operators can access waivers remotely and set retention periods. This efficient, user-friendly tool enhances operational ease, saving time and money while providing quick access to signed documents within seconds.

ecommerceHowItWorksData.title: Register
ecommerceHowItWorksData.desc: Guests can quickly register or shop as a guest on your site.

ecommerceHowItWorksData.title: Shop
ecommerceHowItWorksData.desc: Customers make their selections for game cards, packages, or other items.

ecommerceHowItWorksData.title: Discounts
ecommerceHowItWorksData.desc: Apply any current discount options, promos, or specials.

ecommerceHowItWorksData.title: Check Out & Pay
ecommerceHowItWorksData.desc: Guests can then print the QR code or save it on their phone.

ecommerceHowItWorksData.title: Redeem & Play
ecommerceHowItWorksData.desc: QR codes are scanned and redeemed at the center, where guest’s get their play card

ecommerceBonusFeatureData.title: Bonus Feature: Recharge On the Go
ecommerceBonusFeatureData.desc: Receive low play card balance alerts on your phone, allowing guests to recharge straight from their device for uninterrupted play. Embrace the future of gaming convenience with Intercard E-Commerce.

shindiggerPlanSmarter.title: Revolutionize Your Celebrations with Shindigger
shindiggerPlanSmarter.desc: Shindigger goes beyond being a mere reservation system; it's your ultimate celebration facilitator. Whether it's a birthday bash, corporate event, or any gathering, Shindigger simplifies the entire process, allowing you to focus on enjoying the festivities.

shindiggerPlanSmarter.title: Unveil the Shindigger™ Experience
shindiggerPlanSmarter.desc: Delve into the boundless possibilities offered by Shindigger. Download our comprehensive brochure to explore how this user-friendly platform, crafted by industry experts at Intercard, can elevate and transform your party planning experience.

shindiggerCraftSteps.title: Choose A Location
shindiggerCraftSteps.desc: Select from a variety of vibrant venues that match your party style.

shindiggerCraftSteps.title: Choose A Day
shindiggerCraftSteps.desc: Set the perfect date for your shindig, ensuring everyone can partake in the celebration.

shindiggerCraftSteps.title: Guest Count
shindiggerCraftSteps.desc: Tailor your party experience by specifying the number of attendees.

shindiggerCraftSteps.title: Pick A Party Package
shindiggerCraftSteps.desc: Customize your celebration with a range of party packages designed for every occasion.

shindiggerCraftSteps.title: Select A Time
shindiggerCraftSteps.desc: Choose the party hour that suits you and your guests.
